neighbors.name: Forsberg Farm Trust
neighbors.claims: Forsberg Farm Trust is a private family trust that owns farmland in Saline County, Kansas (parcel PIN 085124200000000901001) as documented by county property records [Saline County Appraiser – Parcel Search](https://www.salinecountyks.gov/Appraiser/parcelsearch). The trust is not registered as a corporation or LLC in Kansas, meaning its beneficiaries (presumably the Forsberg family members) are not publicly listed in state business filings [Kansas Secretary of State – Business Entity Search](https://www.kansas.gov/bess). There are no news reports or public disclosures linking Forsberg Farm Trust to any development projects or community initiatives, indicating it functions solely as a landholding vehicle with a very limited public profile.
neighbors.influence_justification: Small private farm trust with no known broader holdings or political connections

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage the Forsberg family (trustees) through personal outreach, emphasizing respect for their long-held farmland and addressing any concerns about project impacts; offer reasonable mitigations or benefits (such as buffer areas or compensation) to maintain goodwill and alleviate their worries

overview_summary: The identified neighbor is a private family farm trust with no overt corporate ties or political profile. Forsberg Farm Trust primarily serves as a landholding entity for agricultural property, with little publicly available information on its ownership beyond the family name. This suggests any stance on development would be driven by personal farmland interests rather than organized community influence.
